Description: Action word.Signal state:0: Not activated1: ActivatedBit assignments:Bit 0: Error class 0Bit 1: Error class 1Bit 2: Error class 2Bit 3: Error class 3Bit 4: Error class 4Bit 5: ReservedBit 6: Motor is at a standstill (_n_act < 9 RPM)Bit 7: Motor movement in positive directionBit 8: Motor movement in negative directionBit 9: Assignment can be set via parameter DPL_intLimBit 10: Assignment can be set via parameterDS402intLimBit 11: Profile generator idle (reference velocity is0)Bit 12: Profile generator deceleratesBit 13: Profile generator acceleratesBit 14: Profile generator moves at constant speedBit 15: Reserved
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 301C:4hModbus 7176Profibus 7176CIP 128.1.4ModbusTCP 7176EtherCAT 301C:4hPROFINET 7176
